attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is fast becoming a Disease of our society - it seems that we are losing at least one teenager a day to this senseless crime.  These young people are our countrys' future and something has to be done - and soon.  National service should be compulsory - other countries have it - we had it.  Train these young thugs to have respect and discipline and give them proper training in combat and weapons!!!! Then let them fight for our country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
